featured.text: Zoe was rather healthy when she was found, and once under the care of the orphanage she was very happy, consuming six gallons of vitamin-rich milk a day and earning a reputation as a confident, naughty and mischievous youngster.
All three _____ seem confident that they will be elected, but we won’t know until the outcome of the election is announced.
Henna Heals, an artist group based in Canada, uses henna tattoos to help women suffering from cancer feel confident and beautiful again.
Self-confident people are their own best friends.

definition.zh_def: 自信的，對自己的能力或品質有信心的。
definition.en_def: Having a strong belief or assurance in oneself or one's abilities.
definition.example: She felt confident about her presentation.
